text: Eaba ho etsahala hore a koalloe le banna ba ba beli. Ke moo ka le leng e mong a ileng a re: “Ke lorile ke tlhotla veine.” E mong eena o re: “‘Na ke lorile ke roetse seroto sa bohobe hlohong ea ka, linonyana li eja bohobe boo. Joale ak’u re manollele tlhaloso ea tsona, hobane re’a u bona hore u har’a ba etsang botle
